org.alljoyn.config

Interface ConfigService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.alljoyn.services.common.ServiceCommon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigServiceImpl

    public interface ConfigService
extends org.alljoyn.services.common.ServiceCommon
    An interface for both Config client (consumer) and server (producer). An application may want to implement both, but still use one bus, so for convenience both functionalities are encapsulated here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PROTOCOL_VERSION
      The Config protocol version.

    • Method Detail

      • startConfigServer

        void startConfigServer(org.alljoyn.services.common.PropertyStore propertyStore,
                     ConfigChangeListener configChangeListener,
                     RestartHandler restartHandler,
                     FactoryResetHandler factoryResetHandler,
                     PassphraseChangedListener passphraseChangeListener,
                     org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Start server mode. The application creates the BusAttachment
        Parameters:
        propertyStore - a map of device/application properties.
        configChangeListener - listener to configuration changes coming from remote client peers.
        restartHandler - handler for restart requests coming from remote client peers.
        factoryResetHandler - handler for factory reset requests coming from remote client peers.
        passphraseChangeListener - listener to password changes coming from remote client peers.
        bus - the AllJoyn bus attachment.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        AboutKeys

      • stopConfigServer

        void stopConfigServer()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Stop server mode.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startConfigClient

        void startConfigClient(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Start client mode. The application creates the BusAttachment
        Parameters:
        bus - the AllJoyn bus attachment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createFeatureConfigClient

        ConfigClient createFeatureConfigClient(java.lang.String deviceName,
                                     org.alljoyn.services.common.ServiceAvailabilityListener serviceAvailabilityListener,
                                     short port)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Create an Config client for a peer.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the remote device
        serviceAvailabilityListener - listener for connection loss
        port - the peer's bound port of the About server
        Returns:
        ConfigClient for running a session with the peer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • stopConfigClient

        void stopConfigClient()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Stop client mode. Disconnect all sessions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
